# believe_character (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "believe_character" "example_character" {
  character_id = "character_id"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `character_id` (String)
- `find_one_by` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--find_one_by))

### Read-Only

- `background` (String) Character background and history
- `date_of_birth` (String) Character's date of birth
- `email` (String) Character's email address
- `emotional_stats` (Attributes) Emotional intelligence stats (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--emotional_stats))
- `growth_arcs` (Attributes List) Character development across seasons (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--growth_arcs))
- `height_meters` (Number) Height in meters
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `name` (String) Character's full name
- `personality_traits` (List of String) Key personality traits
- `profile_image_url` (String) URL to character's profile image
- `role` (String) Character's role
Available values: "coach", "player", "owner", "manager", "staff", "journalist", "family", "friend", "fan", "other".
- `salary_gbp` (String) Annual salary in GBP
- `signature_quotes` (List of String) Memorable quotes from this character
- `team_id` (String) ID of the team they belong to

<a id="nestedatt--find_one_by"></a>
### Nested Schema for `find_one_by`

Optional:

- `min_optimism` (Number) Minimum optimism score
- `role` (String) Filter by role
Available values: "coach", "player", "owner", "manager", "staff", "journalist", "family", "friend", "fan", "other".
- `team_id` (String) Filter by team ID


<a id="nestedatt--emotional_stats"></a>
### Nested Schema for `emotional_stats`

Read-Only:

- `curiosity` (Number) Level of curiosity over judgment (0-100)
- `empathy` (Number) Capacity for empathy (0-100)
- `optimism` (Number) Level of optimism (0-100)
- `resilience` (Number) Bounce-back ability (0-100)
- `vulnerability` (Number) Willingness to be vulnerable (0-100)


<a id="nestedatt--growth_arcs"></a>
### Nested Schema for `growth_arcs`

Read-Only:

- `breakthrough` (String) Key breakthrough moment
- `challenge` (String) Main challenge faced
- `ending_point` (String) Where the character ends up
- `season` (Number) Season number
- `starting_point` (String) Where the character starts emotionally
